chain.tcl (annotations | original source)

# Horizontal chain of a set of ext image.
#
proc hchain {name inf sup {pas 1}} {
    for {set i $inf} {$i <= $sup} {incr i $pas} {
	set num [format "%.3d" $i]
	hsearch ${name}$num
    }
}

proc hchain2 {name inf sup {pas 1}} {
    for {set i $inf} {$i <= $sup} {incr i $pas} {
	set num [format "%.2d" $i]
	hsearch ${name}$num
    }
}
